name: Unscrambled and Undefended
description:
Unscrambled and Undefended

The earth is under attack and it's up to you to rescue poor defenceless civilians from the marauding alien invaliders!

Use arrow keys or WASD to move and space to fire... pick up the civilians and put them safely in their houses!

To Run

Unzip the files into a directory and run Unscrambled.exe
